description:
No need to slide your U-Lock under your belt or attach a lock holder to your frame. The Lite Lok can be worn as a high-viz belt. The reflective cover helps you be seen when worn and it protects your bike's paint when in use. Tried-and-true combination lock is easy to use, means fewer keys to tote about, and can be reset if the need arises.

  • Hardened steel 6mm chain links are strong and durability
  • Steel lock body with brass mechanism
  • 600-denier reflective cover keeps you visible and protects your bike’s paint
  • 4-digit resettable combination
  • Washable sleeve keeps things fresh
  • Fits waist sizes 28-44in
  • Locking circumference of 75cm
name: Hiplok Spin Lock
